âœ… Good advice out there: try a plunger first, use a drain snake, and baking soda + vinegar can help with minor clogs.

âš ï¸ What they miss: chemical drain cleaners eat through old pipes. And if you have a garbage disposal clog, snaking from the wrong end just pushes it deeper.

ğŸ’¡ George's Pro Tip: Wet/dry shop vac on the drain opening. Seal it tight. The suction pulls clogs out instead of pushing them in. Game changer.
